kpi.name: MGW_353a

kpi_info.title: Cells discarded to EPD on ingress
kpi_info.use: Total cells discarded to EPD on ingress. When congestion occurs and buffers are filling up, Early Packet Discard (EPD) discards new packets arriving in the queue. All cells associated with a new packet are discarded. The remaining buffer space can then be used for ATM cells belonging to packets that are already in the queue.

kpi.kpi_alias: Cells discarded to EPD on ingress
